event_registry_properties.name: title
description
event_registry_properties.item: The %DISTRO% Service manager tried to start the service, but could not.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: The service is not running. It will not be started until the maintenance state is cleared. Services with require-type dependencies on the service will not be started. (Use svcs -xv service_fmri to see a list of services waiting for the service to start.)
event_registry_properties.name: action
details
